text: Kenneth Charles "Ken" Swofford (July 25, 1933 â€“ November 1, 2018) was an American actor. He was born in Du Quoin, Illinois. Between 1962 and 1995, Swofford's movie roles included Thelma & Louise, Skyjacked, Black Roses and The Andromeda Strain. Swofford appeared on such television series as Fame, Switch, The Oregon Trail, Rich Man, Poor Man Book II, Murder, She Wrote, and as a cast member of the mystery series Ellery Queen. Swofford died on November 1, 2018 in Garden Grove, California at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois
title: Ken Swofford
